plot: "Here is a novel sight - a full grown bear, in a wild state, wrestling with his keeper. After considerable maneuvering, the keeper finally throws him, and the bear acknowledges his defeat ...
title: The Wrestling Bear
plot_es: "Here is a novel sight - a full grown bear, in a wild state, wrestling with his keeper. After considerable maneuvering, the keeper finally throws him, and the bear acknowledges his defeat ...
